job_description: Make your mark at Comcast -- a Fortune 30 global media and technology company. We build applications that are idempotent and at the same time supported with necessary guard rails, which allow the automation solution to bring out its full potential but also with a safety hook all the time. The Software Development Engineer I (SDE I) is a key contributor on Agile Scrum teams, delivering high-quality software across web, mobile, API, and cloud platforms. This role emphasizes adaptability, continuous learning, and collaboration, with responsibilities spanning feature development, cloud migration, pipeline automation, and test-driven development. Ideal candidates demonstrate strong coding proficiency, experience with modern development tools and frameworks, and a production-first mindset focused on scalability and reliability. The SDE I thrives in a fast-paced environment, actively engages in peer reviews, and contributes to team and process improvements.
